revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #53 Roseli |image = [[File:Roseli.png]] |caption = This Berry is sweet with a hint of bitterness and has a lingering sweet scent. The scent of this Berry plant attracts wild Pokémon. |growtime = 7h |harvest = 38 berries |replant = 5% |points = 2,500 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *25 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} === Description === '''Roseli''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 ripe [[Mago]], at least 1 ripe [[Nanab]], at least 1 ripe [[Magost]] and at least 1 ripe [[Watmel]]. It emits an aura that increases the chance of encountering a wandering Pokemon. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 mins 10 secs || 1 hour 24 mins || 3 hours 30 mins || 7 hours - 14 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RoseliTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RoseliTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RoseliTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (wandering chance) | ||
x1.01 ||
x1.02 ||
x1.03 |} ==== Ripening Time with Modifiers ==== {| class="wikitable collapsible" ! !! Ripe-Wither !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! Time to Ripen
(No Modifiers) | 7 hours -
14 hours ||
--- |- ! Time to Ripen
(Mulch/Sprayduck) | 4 hours 40 mins -
9 hours 20 mins ||
68 mulch |- ! Time to Ripen
(Mulch*Sprayduck) | 3 hours 7 mins -
6 hours 14 mins ||
47 mulch |} === Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your [[farm]] in the following way to obtain this berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Mago.png|30px]]
[[Mago]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Magost.png|30px]] [[Magost]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Mago.png|30px]]
[[Mago]] |- | [[File:Nanab.png|30px]] [[Nanab]] || || [[File:Watmel.png|30px]] [[Watmel]] || || [[File:Nanab.png|30px]] [[Nanab]] |- style="height: 55px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Magost.png|30px]] [[Magost]] || || [[File:Mago.png|30px]]
[[Mago]] || || [[File:Magost.png|30px]] [[Magost]] |- | [[File:Watmel.png|30px]] [[Watmel]] || || [[File:Nanab.png|30px]] [[Nanab]] || || [[File:Watmel.png|30px]] [[Watmel]] |} ==== Timing Table ==== {| class="collapsible wikitable" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Watmel]] || - || - || - |- | [[Magost]] || 4 hours until ripe || 2 hours 40 mins until ripe || 1 hour 47 mins until ripe |- | [[Mago]] || 6 mins 10 secs until ripe || 4 mins 7 secs until ripe || Not practical |- | [[Nanab]] || 4 mins 10 secs until ripe || 2 mins 47 secs until ripe || Not practical |- |} {{Berries}}
